segments.source_content:
---
slug: /164
title: "This Week In React #164: so back! 30k, Next.js, Remix, Taint API, Activity, RSCs, React-Forget, Docusaurus, MDX, Storybook, Expo Orbit, Ignite, Victory XL, Reanimated, TypeScript..."
authors: [slorber]
date: 11-29-2023
---

translations.ja: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64
皆さん、こんにちは！

segments.source_content: It's been a long time, I hope you haven't missed me too much 😄

translations.ja: 久しぶりです、あまり寂しがっていなかったらいいのですが 😄

segments.source_content: I've been on paternity leave and enjoyed my little Louise 👨‍🍼😍.

translations.ja: 私は育児休暇を取得し、可愛いルイーズと過ごす時間を楽しみました 👨‍🍼😍。

segments.source_content: Apparently my absence hasn't slowed down the growth of this newsletter, which has just [passed 30,000 subscribers](https://www.indiehackers.com/product/french-react-newsletter/30-000-subscribers--NkKag3m683I_z7J3TCI)! 🥳️

translations.ja: どうやら私の不在もこのニュースレターの成長を妨げることはなく、[30,000人の購読者を突破](https://www.indiehackers.com/product/french-react-newsletter/30-000-subscribers--NkKag3m683I_z7J3TCI)しました！ 🥳️

segments.source_content: This is the first time I've taken such a long break (5 weeks), and it's hard to get back at it. You know I like to be exhaustive, but it's impossible for me to read and comment on everything that's happened since the last issue 😅. In short, this email is going to contain a lot of interesting links, but not necessarily commented on. I'll do better next week, I promise!

translations.ja: こんなに長い休暇（5週間）を取るのは初めてで、復帰するのは大変です。私は徹底的にやりたい性格ですが、前回の号以降に起こったすべてを読み、コメントするのは不可能です 😅。要するに、このメールには多くの興味深いリンクが含まれていますが、必ずしも解説付きではありません。来週はもっと頑張ります、約束します！

segments.source_content: In the future, I'd like to make this more professional, and publish every single week consistently. I'm [looking for someone to help me](https://thisweekinreact.com/job). If you're interested, please apply (paid).

translations.ja: 将来的には、もっとプロフェッショナルに、毎週確実に発行したいと考えています。[手伝ってくれる人を探しています](https://thisweekinreact.com/job)。興味のある方はぜひ応募してください（有償）。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_c6da205d

segments.source_content: **💡 [Check this newsletter on Twitter](https://slo.im/thread) - visual format 🎨**

translations.ja: **💡 [このニュースレターをTwitterでチェック](https://slo.im/thread) - ビジュアル形式 🎨**
@@untranslatable_placeholder_cf4363fc
@@untranslatable_placeholder_2a3434e4
## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor1}
[![Frontendmasters](/emails/issues/158/frontendmasters.jpg)](https://frontendmasters.com/learn/react/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact\&utm_campaign=reactpath)

segments.source_content: **[FrontendMasters – Complete React.js Learning Path to Senior React Developer](https://frontendmasters.com/learn/react/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact\&utm_campaign=reactpath)**

translations.ja: **[FrontendMasters – シニアReact開発者への完全なReact.js学習パス](https://frontendmasters.com/learn/react/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_medium=thisweekinreact\&utm_campaign=reactpath)**

segments.source_content: Learn React.js from the ground up to advanced topics like performance, testing, and code quality. Start by building a real-world app in the Complete Introduction to React. Continue with Intermediate React, integrating the most popular tools from the ecosystem. Then learn performance, TypeScript, and even Next.js, the fullstack React framework!

translations.ja: React.jsを基礎から学び、パフォーマンス、テスト、コード品質などの高度なトピックまでカバーします。まずは「React完全入門」で実践的なアプリを構築しましょう。続けて「中級React」でエコシステムの人気ツールを統合します。さらにパフォーマンス、TypeScript、そしてフルスタックReactフレームワークであるNext.jsも学べます！
## ⚛️ React {#react}
[![Next.js 14](/emails/issues/164/nextjs-14.jpg)](https://nextjs.org/blog/next-14)
[**Next.js 14**](https://nextjs.org/blog/next-14)

segments.source_content: Next.js 14 has been announced at Next.js conf, including:

translations.ja: Next.js 14がNext.js confで発表され、以下が含まれます：

segments.source_content:
* Server Actions stable
* Turbopack almost stable
* Introducing Partial Pre-Rendering (experimental)
* New learning resource

translations.ja:
* Server Actionsが安定版に
* Turbopackがほぼ安定版に
* Partial Pre-Renderingの導入（実験的）
* 新しい学習リソース
関連情報：

segments.source_content:
* 🎥 [Playlist YouTube Next.js conf](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBnKlKpPeagl57K9bCw_IXShWQXePnXjY)
* 📜 [Next.js 14 on Vercel](https://vercel.com/changelog/next-js-14)
* 📜 [A look at Partial Prerendering with Next.js 14 on Vercel.](https://vercel.com/blog/partial-prerendering-with-next-js-creating-a-new-default-rendering-model)

translations.ja:
* 🎥 [Next.js confのYouTubeプレイリスト](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBnKlKpPeagl57K9bCw_IXShWQXePnXjY)
* 📜 [VercelでのNext.js 14](https://vercel.com/changelog/next-js-14)
* 📜 [VercelでのNext.js 14のPartial Prerenderingについて](https://vercel.com/blog/partial-prerendering-with-next-js-creating-a-new-default-rendering-model)

segments.source_content:
* 🐦 [Server Actions are available in React Canary](https://twitter.com/reactjs/status/1716573234160967762)
* 🐦 [Andrew Clark - "React 19 coming soon"](https://twitter.com/acdlite/status/1719474730363662473)
* 🐦 [Ryan Florence - "React Server Components on the Remix roadmap"](https://twitter.com/ryanflorence/status/1729274387671760936)
* 👀 [React PR - `<Offscreen>` renamed as `<Activity>`](https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/27640): Dan Abramov explains the `<Offscreen>` name was misleading for this upcoming Concurrent React feature.
* 👀 [React PR - Generate sourcemaps for production build artifacts](https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/26446): great news to improve the DX of many tools permitting to debug on your prod bundle, such as Sentry or Replay.
* 👀 [React Canary Changelog](https://github.com/facebook/react/blob/main/CHANGELOG-canary.md): as planned, React canary releases have started to be documented properly.
* 📖 [React docs - "use server"](https://react.dev/reference/react/use-server)
* 📖 [React docs - Taint API](https://react.dev/reference/react/experimental_taintObjectReference): new experimental API to avoid sending sensitive data to the client in a RSC context.
* 📖 [Redux Toolkit 2.0 + Redux core 5.0 Migration Guide](https://deploy-preview-3089--redux-starter-kit-docs.netlify.app/migrations/migrating-1.x-to-2.x): new versions of RTK, React-Redux and Redux core are in RC.
* 📜 [Vercel - How to Think About Security in Next.js](https://nextjs.org/blog/security-nextjs-server-components-actions): gives great advices to avoid security issues related to RSCs and Server Actions, in particular how to avoid exposing sensitive data. Recommends to validate unsafe inputs, to add Access Control checks, to use a Data Access Layer, to test the new React Taint API...
* 📜 [Why we use AWS instead of Vercel to host our Next.js app](https://graphite.dev/blog/why-we-use-aws-instead-of-vercel): Graphite decided to use EC2 containers instead of an edge runtime. Surprisingly performance remains similar.
* 📜 [Why useSyncExternalStore Is Not Used in Jotai](https://blog.axlight.com/posts/why-use-sync-external-store-is-not-used-in-jotai/): on the difficulty to make both useTransition and useSyncExternalStore work at the same time.
* 📜 [Event Types in React and TypeScript](https://www.totaltypescript.com/event-types-in-react-and-typescript): useful techniques if you can't remember types to use for your event handlers.
* 📜 [Why You Need React Query](https://tkdodo.eu/blog/why-you-want-react-query): gives great reasons to avoid implementing your own data fetching based on useEffect, it's more complex than it looks like.
* 📜 [React Server Components, without a framework?](https://timtech.blog/posts/react-server-components-rsc-no-framework/): great technical article to understand how RSCs work under the hood. Migrates a simple CRA app to a custom RSC setup.
* 📜 [Remix ❤️ Vite](https://remix.run/blog/remix-heart-vite): with Remix 2.2, it's now possible to use Remix as a Vite plugin. This comes with interesting benefits.
* 📜 [Why I'm Using Next.js](https://leerob.io/blog/using-nextjs)
* 📜 [Why I Won't Use Next.js](https://www.epicweb.dev/why-i-wont-use-nextjs)
* 📜 [What do we know about React Forget](https://www.code-insights.dev/posts/what-do-we-konw-about-react-forget)
* 📜 [Using Selectlist in React](https://polypane.app/blog/using-selectlist-in-react/)
* 📜 [A Complete Guide To Using Cookies in Next.js](https://www.propelauth.com/post/cookies-in-next-js)
* 📜 [Pierre's Next.js Cache Strategy](https://pierre.co/share/fe34c8b7-4054-4e07-b108-c6c8230cfab1)
* 📜 [React Server Components - Introduction and Background](https://jessedit.tech/articles/react-server-components/1-background/)
* 📜 [On Mixing Client and Server](https://matt-rickard.com/on-mixing-client-and-server)
* 📜 [Building a drawer component - Vaul](https://emilkowal.ski/ui/building-a-drawer-component)
* 📜 [Typed server-safe DOM event listeners in Remix](https://alemtuzlak.hashnode.dev/typed-server-safe-dom-event-listeners-in-remix)
* 📜 [Exploring Remix with Vite](https://alemtuzlak.hashnode.dev/exploring-remix-with-vite)
* 📜 [Building the most ambitious sites on the Web with Vercel and Next.js 14](https://vercel.com/blog/building-the-most-ambitious-sites-on-the-web-with-vercel-and-next-js-14)
* 📜 [re-re-reselect — Simplifying React state management](https://causal.app/blog/re-re-reselect)
* 📜 [Refreshing the Next.js App Router When Your Markdown Content Changes](https://www.steveruiz.me/posts/nextjs-refresh-content)
* 📜 [Guide to React Suspense and use hook for busy bees](https://sinja.io/blog/guide-to-react-suspense)
* 📜 [Concurrency in React 18 for busy bees](https://sinja.io/blog/guide-to-concurrency-in-react-18)
* 📜 [React-Admin - Turning Open-Source Into Profit: Our Journey](https://marmelab.com/blog/2023/11/08/open-source-profit-1.html)
* 📜 [Keep that cursor still!](https://giacomocerquone.com/keep-input-cursor-still/)
* 📜 [Testing against every Next.js canary release](https://francoisbest.com/posts/2023/testing-against-every-nextjs-canary-release)
* 📜 [Against Single Element React Components](https://www.jameskerr.blog/posts/against-single-element-react-components/)
* 📜 [How React works](https://incepter.github.io/how-react-works/)
* 📜 [Out of Order Streaming from Scratch](https://gal.hagever.com/posts/out-of-order-streaming-from-scratch)
* 📜 [daily.dev - Moving back to React](https://daily.dev/blog/moving-back-to-react)
* 📜 [Headless Component: a pattern for composing React UIs](https://martinfowler.com/articles/headless-component.html)
* 📜 [When NOT to use shadcn/ui?](https://mwskwong.com/blog/when-not-to-use-shadcn-ui)
* 📜 [React Query Auth Token Refresh](https://elazizi.com/posts/react-query-auth-token-refresh/)
* 📦 [Docusaurus v3.0 - MDX 3, TS/ESM configs, unlisted...](https://docusaurus.io/blog/releases/3.0)
* 📦 [React Aria Components RC](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/releases/2023-11-8.html)
* 📦 [MDX v3 - Updating Node, await support...](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v3/)
* 📦 [Remix v2.3](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#v230)
* 📦 [Astro 4.0 beta](https://astro.build/blog/astro-4-beta/?tw)
* 📦 [Storybook 7.5 - Vite 5, Next.js improvements, faster...](https://storybook.js.org/blog/storybook-7-5/)
* 🎥 [React Forget Compiler - Understanding Idiomatic React](https://portal.gitnation.org/contents/understanding-idiomatic-react)

translations.ja:
* 🐦 [React CanaryでServer Actionsが利用可能に](https://twitter.com/reactjs/status/1716573234160967762)
* 🐦 [Andrew Clark - 「React 19が間もなくリリース」](https://twitter.com/acdlite/status/1719474730363662473)
* 🐦 [Ryan Florence - 「RemixのロードマップにReact Server Componentsが追加」](https://twitter.com/ryanflorence/status/1729274387671760936)
* 👀 [React PR - `<Offscreen>`が`<Activity>`に改名](https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/27640): Dan Abramovが、この今後のConcurrent React機能に対して`<Offscreen>`という名前が誤解を招くと説明。
* 👀 [React PR - 本番ビルド成果物にソースマップを生成](https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/26446): SentryやReplayなど、本番バンドル上でデバッグを可能にする多くのツールのDX向上に役立つ朗報。
* 👀 [React Canary 変更履歴](https://github.com/facebook/react/blob/main/CHANGELOG-canary.md): 計画通り、React Canaryリリースが適切にドキュメント化され始めました。
* 📖 [React ドキュメント - "use server"](https://react.dev/reference/react/use-server)
* 📖 [React ドキュメント - Taint API](https://react.dev/reference/react/experimental_taintObjectReference): RSCコンテキストでクライアントに機密データを送信しないようにするための新しい実験的API。
* 📖 [Redux Toolkit 2.0 + Redux core 5.0 移行ガイド](https://deploy-preview-3089--redux-starter-kit-docs.netlify.app/migrations/migrating-1.x-to-2.x): RTK、React-Redux、Redux coreの新バージョンがRC段階。
* 📜 [Vercel - Next.jsにおけるセキュリティの考え方](https://nextjs.org/blog/security-nextjs-server-components-actions): RSCとServer Actionsに関連するセキュリティ問題を回避するための優れたアドバイスを提供。特に、安全でない入力の検証、アクセス制御チェックの追加、データアクセス層の使用、新しいReact Taint APIのテストなどを推奨。
* 📜 [Next.jsアプリをホストするためにVercelではなくAWSを使用する理由](https://graphite.dev/blog/why-we-use-aws-instead-of-vercel): GraphiteはエッジランタイムではなくEC2コンテナを使用することを決定。驚くべきことにパフォーマンスは同程度。
* 📜 [JotaiでuseSyncExternalStoreが使用されない理由](https://blog.axlight.com/posts/why-use-sync-external-store-is-not-used-in-jotai/): useTransitionとuseSyncExternalStoreを同時に動作させる難しさについて。
* 📜 [ReactとTypeScriptにおけるイベントタイプ](https://www.totaltypescript.com/event-types-in-react-and-typescript): イベントハンドラに使用する型を覚えていられない場合に役立つテクニック。
* 📜 [React Queryが必要な理由](https://tkdodo.eu/blog/why-you-want-react-query): useEffectベースの独自データフェッチ実装を避けるべき強力な理由を提示。見た目以上に複雑。
* 📜 [フレームワークなしでReact Server Components？](https://timtech.blog/posts/react-server-components-rsc-no-framework/): RSCの内部動作を理解するための優れた技術記事。シンプルなCRAアプリをカスタムRSCセットアップに移行。
* 📜 [Remix ❤️ Vite](https://remix.run/blog/remix-heart-vite): Remix 2.2で、RemixをViteプラグインとして使用可能に。興味深い利点が付随。
* 📜 [私がNext.jsを使用する理由](https://leerob.io/blog/using-nextjs)
* 📜 [私がNext.jsを使用しない理由](https://www.epicweb.dev/why-i-wont-use-nextjs)
* 📜 [React Forgetについて私たちが知っていること](https://www.code-insights.dev/posts/what-do-we-konw-about-react-forget)
* 📜 [ReactでSelectlistを使用する](https://polypane.app/blog/using-selectlist-in-react/)
* 📜 [Next.jsでCookieを使用する完全ガイド](https://www.propelauth.com/post/cookies-in-next-js)
* 📜 [PierreのNext.jsキャッシュ戦略](https://pierre.co/share/fe34c8b7-4054-4e07-b108-c6c8230cfab1)
* 📜 [React Server Components - 導入と背景](https://jessedit.tech/articles/react-server-components/1-background/)
* 📜 [クライアントとサーバーの混合について](https://matt-rickard.com/on-mixing-client-and-server)
* 📜 [ドロワーコンポーネントの構築 - Vaul](https://emilkowal.ski/ui/building-a-drawer-component)
* 📜 [Remixにおける型安全なサーバーサイドDOMイベントリスナー](https://alemtuzlak.hashnode.dev/typed-server-safe-dom-event-listeners-in-remix)
* 📜 [Viteを使ったRemixの探索](https://alemtuzlak.hashnode.dev/exploring-remix-with-vite)
* 📜 [VercelとNext.js 14で最も野心的なWebサイトを構築](https://vercel.com/blog/building-the-most-ambitious-sites-on-the-web-with-vercel-and-next-js-14)
* 📜 [re-re-reselect — React状態管理の簡素化](https://causal.app/blog/re-re-reselect)
* 📜 [Markdownコンテンツ変更時にNext.js App Routerを更新](https://www.steveruiz.me/posts/nextjs-refresh-content)
* 📜 [忙しい人のためのReact Suspenseとuseフックガイド](https://sinja.io/blog/guide-to-react-suspense)
* 📜 [忙しい人のためのReact 18の並行性](https://sinja.io/blog/guide-to-concurrency-in-react-18)
* 📜 [React-Admin - オープンソースを利益に変える: 私たちの旅](https://marmelab.com/blog/2023/11/08/open-source-profit-1.html)
* 📜 [カーソルを静止させろ！](https://giacomocerquone.com/keep-input-cursor-still/)
* 📜 [すべてのNext.js Canaryリリースに対するテスト](https://francoisbest.com/posts/2023/testing-against-every-nextjs-canary-release)
* 📜 [単一要素Reactコンポーネントに反対する](https://www.jameskerr.blog/posts/against-single-element-react-components/)
* 📜 [Reactの動作原理](https://incepter.github.io/how-react-works/)
* 📜 [順不同ストリーミングをゼロから実装](https://gal.hagever.com/posts/out-of-order-streaming-from-scratch)
* 📜 [daily.dev - Reactへの回帰](https://daily.dev/blog/moving-back-to-react)
* 📜 [Headless Component: React UIを構成するパターン](https://martinfowler.com/articles/headless-component.html)
* 📜 [shadcn/uiを使用すべきでない場合](https://mwskwong.com/blog/when-not-to-use-shadcn-ui)
* 📜 [React Queryでの認証トークン更新](https://elazizi.com/posts/react-query-auth-token-refresh/)
* 📦 [Docusaurus v3.0 - MDX 3、TS/ESM設定、非公開機能...](https://docusaurus.io/blog/releases/3.0)
* 📦 [React Aria Components RC](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/releases/2023-11-8.html)
* 📦 [MDX v3 - Node更新、awaitサポート...](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v3/)
* 📦 [Remix v2.3](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#v230)
* 📦 [Astro 4.0 beta](https://astro.build/blog/astro-4-beta/?tw)
* 📦 [Storybook 7.5 - Vite 5、Next.js改善、高速化...](https://storybook.js.org/blog/storybook-7-5/)
* 🎥 [React Forgetコンパイラ - 慣用的なReactの理解](https://portal.gitnation.org/contents/understanding-idiomatic-react)
@@untranslatable_placeholder_65095059
## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor2}
[![React向けノーコードフォームビルダー](/emails/issues/164/surveyjs.jpg)](https://surveyjs.io/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=email)
**[React向けノーコードフォームビルダー](https://surveyjs.io/?utm_source=thisweekinreact\&utm_medium=email)**

segments.source_content: SurveyJS is a product suite of open-source JavaScript libraries that allow you to **build a** **robust form management system** fully integrated into your IT infrastructure.

translations.ja: SurveyJSは、**堅牢なフォーム管理システム**を構築できるオープンソースのJavaScriptライブラリスイートです。ITインフラに完全に統合可能です。

segments.source_content: You can create and easily modify multiple **JSON-based forms in a drag-and-drop form builder with an integrated Theme Editor**. Adjust various UI theme settings to achieve unique form looks. Render custom forms in your React application, collect responses from users, and **maintain full control over the data flow**. These libraries do not directly interact with server code or databases. Visit [https://surveyjs.io/](https://surveyjs.io/) to try out our free full-scale demo and find multiple code examples.

translations.ja: **ドラッグ＆ドロップ式のフォームビルダーと統合テーマエディター**を使用して、複数のJSONベースのフォームを作成・編集できます。UIテーマ設定を調整し、独自のフォームデザインを実現可能です。Reactアプリケーションでカスタムフォームをレンダリングし、ユーザーからの回答を収集、**データフローを完全に制御**できます。これらのライブラリはサーバーコードやデータベースと直接やり取りしません。[https://surveyjs.io/](https://surveyjs.io/) にアクセスし、無料のフルスケールデモをお試しいただき、多数のコード例をご覧ください。
## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}

segments.source_content:
* 💸 [Moropo - We'll Get Your App to 60% UI Test Coverage in 6 Weeks or You Don't Pay](https://www.moropo.com/automation-offer?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_medium=emails\&utm_campaign=twir-20231129)
* 🐦 [Amazon using React-Native for years, including the main Amazon Shopping app](https://twitter.com/reactnative/status/1722025802974277983)
* 🐦 [Static Hermes demo - JS performance comparable to C++](https://twitter.com/tmikov/status/1720103356738474060)
* 👀 [RFC - Golden Template for create-react-native-library](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/721)
* 👀 [RFC - Introducing reactNativeManifest to package.json](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/717)
* 📖 [Develop an app with Expo - Overview](https://docs.expo.dev/workflow/overview/)
* 📜 [Universal Links are Important](https://evanbacon.dev/blog/universal-links)
